dataset_name: Liability Trap - Semantic Twins for RAG Testing
description: 50 pairs of legal/compliance clauses that differ by negations or subjects to test semantic compression systems
purpose: Test if compressed embeddings can distinguish between clauses with opposite meanings

test_cases.clause_a: The Lessee shall be liable for structural repairs.
test_cases.clause_b: The Lessee shall not be liable for structural repairs.
test_cases.clause_c: The Lessor shall be liable for structural repairs.

test_cases.clause_a: The Company shall indemnify the Client against all claims.
test_cases.clause_b: The Company shall not indemnify the Client against all claims.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client shall indemnify the Company against all claims.

test_cases.clause_a: Confidential information may be disclosed to third parties.
test_cases.clause_b: Confidential information may not be disclosed to third parties.
test_cases.clause_c: Public information may be disclosed to third parties.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor is responsible for all safety measures.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor is not responsible for any safety measures.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client is responsible for all safety measures.

test_cases.clause_a: Payment shall be made within 30 days of invoice.
test_cases.clause_b: Payment shall not be made within 30 days of invoice.
test_cases.clause_c: Payment shall be made within 60 days of invoice.

test_cases.clause_a: The Employee must work on weekends.
test_cases.clause_b: The Employee need not work on weekends.
test_cases.clause_c: The Employer must work on weekends.

test_cases.clause_a: Termination requires 90 days written notice.
test_cases.clause_b: Termination does not require 90 days written notice.
test_cases.clause_c: Modification requires 90 days written notice.

test_cases.clause_a: The Vendor guarantees product performance.
test_cases.clause_b: The Vendor does not guarantee product performance.
test_cases.clause_c: The Customer guarantees product performance.

test_cases.clause_a: All warranties are hereby provided.
test_cases.clause_b: All warranties are hereby disclaimed.
test_cases.clause_c: Some warranties are hereby provided.

test_cases.clause_a: The Agreement shall remain in full force.
test_cases.clause_b: The Agreement shall not remain in full force.
test_cases.clause_c: The Amendment shall remain in full force.

test_cases.clause_a: The Purchaser has the right of first refusal.
test_cases.clause_b: The Purchaser does not have the right of first refusal.
test_cases.clause_c: The Seller has the right of first refusal.

test_cases.clause_a: The Board shall approve all expenditures.
test_cases.clause_b: The Board shall not approve all expenditures.
test_cases.clause_c: The Committee shall approve all expenditures.

test_cases.clause_a: The Tenant may sublet the premises.
test_cases.clause_b: The Tenant may not sublet the premises.
test_cases.clause_c: The Landlord may sublet the premises.

test_cases.clause_a: Insurance coverage must be maintained.
test_cases.clause_b: Insurance coverage need not be maintained.
test_cases.clause_c: Bond coverage must be maintained.

test_cases.clause_a: The Service Provider shall ensure data security.
test_cases.clause_b: The Service Provider shall not ensure data security.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client shall ensure data security.

test_cases.clause_a: Audits may be conducted quarterly.
test_cases.clause_b: Audits may not be conducted quarterly.
test_cases.clause_c: Reviews may be conducted quarterly.

test_cases.clause_a: The Licensee has exclusive rights to distribution.
test_cases.clause_b: The Licensee does not have exclusive rights to distribution.
test_cases.clause_c: The Licensor has exclusive rights to distribution.

test_cases.clause_a: The Consultant shall provide monthly reports.
test_cases.clause_b: The Consultant shall not provide monthly reports.
test_cases.clause_c: The Manager shall provide monthly reports.

test_cases.clause_a: The Developer warrants code quality.
test_cases.clause_b: The Developer does not warrant code quality.
test_cases.clause_c: The Tester warrants code quality.

test_cases.clause_a: The Participant is eligible for benefits.
test_cases.clause_b: The Participant is not eligible for benefits.
test_cases.clause_c: The Sponsor is eligible for benefits.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor shall obtain all permits.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor shall not obtain all permits.
test_cases.clause_c: The Owner shall obtain all permits.

test_cases.clause_a: The Agent has authority to bind the Principal.
test_cases.clause_b: The Agent does not have authority to bind the Principal.
test_cases.clause_c: The Representative has authority to bind the Principal.

test_cases.clause_a: The Subscriber may cancel at any time.
test_cases.clause_b: The Subscriber may not cancel at any time.
test_cases.clause_c: The Provider may cancel at any time.

test_cases.clause_a: The Guarantor shall be liable for debts.
test_cases.clause_b: The Guarantor shall not be liable for debts.
test_cases.clause_c: The Borrower shall be liable for debts.

test_cases.clause_a: The User must comply with all policies.
test_cases.clause_b: The User need not comply with all policies.
test_cases.clause_c: The Administrator must comply with all policies.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor is liable for consequential damages.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor is not liable for consequential damages.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client is liable for consequential damages.

test_cases.clause_a: The License permits commercial use.
test_cases.clause_b: The License does not permit commercial use.
test_cases.clause_c: The Agreement permits commercial use.

test_cases.clause_a: The Operator shall maintain equipment.
test_cases.clause_b: The Operator shall not maintain equipment.
test_cases.clause_c: The Owner shall maintain equipment.

test_cases.clause_a: The Participant consents to data processing.
test_cases.clause_b: The Participant does not consent to data processing.
test_cases.clause_c: The Controller consents to data processing.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor must meet all specifications.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor need not meet all specifications.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client must meet all specifications.

test_cases.clause_a: The Employee is entitled to overtime pay.
test_cases.clause_b: The Employee is not entitled to overtime pay.
test_cases.clause_c: The Contractor is entitled to overtime pay.

test_cases.clause_a: The Vendor shall provide training services.
test_cases.clause_b: The Vendor shall not provide training services.
test_cases.clause_c: The Customer shall provide training services.

test_cases.clause_a: The Member has voting rights in all matters.
test_cases.clause_b: The Member does not have voting rights in all matters.
test_cases.clause_c: The Director has voting rights in all matters.

test_cases.clause_a: The Publisher owns all derivative works.
test_cases.clause_b: The Publisher does not own all derivative works.
test_cases.clause_c: The Author owns all derivative works.

test_cases.clause_a: The Franchisee may operate multiple locations.
test_cases.clause_b: The Franchisee may not operate multiple locations.
test_cases.clause_c: The Franchisor may operate multiple locations.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor shall indemnify against all losses.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor shall not indemnify against all losses.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client shall indemnify against all losses.

test_cases.clause_a: The User may access the system 24/7.
test_cases.clause_b: The User may not access the system 24/7.
test_cases.clause_c: The Administrator may access the system 24/7.

test_cases.clause_a: The Licensee may sublicense the technology.
test_cases.clause_b: The Licensee may not sublicense the technology.
test_cases.clause_c: The Licensor may sublicense the technology.

test_cases.clause_a: The Participant is bound by non-disclosure.
test_cases.clause_b: The Participant is not bound by non-disclosure.
test_cases.clause_c: The Organizer is bound by non-disclosure.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor must follow safety protocols.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor need not follow safety protocols.
test_cases.clause_c: The Supervisor must follow safety protocols.

test_cases.clause_a: The Subscriber has unlimited data access.
test_cases.clause_b: The Subscriber does not have unlimited data access.
test_cases.clause_c: The Administrator has unlimited data access.

test_cases.clause_a: The Agent may make decisions on behalf of the Principal.
test_cases.clause_b: The Agent may not make decisions on behalf of the Principal.
test_cases.clause_c: The Representative may make decisions on behalf of the Principal.

test_cases.clause_a: The Developer owns all intellectual property.
test_cases.clause_b: The Developer does not own all intellectual property.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client owns all intellectual property.

test_cases.clause_a: The Tenant is responsible for utilities.
test_cases.clause_b: The Tenant is not responsible for utilities.
test_cases.clause_c: The Landlord is responsible for utilities.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor shall provide all materials.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor shall not provide all materials.
test_cases.clause_c: The Owner shall provide all materials.

test_cases.clause_a: The User consents to electronic communications.
test_cases.clause_b: The User does not consent to electronic communications.
test_cases.clause_c: The Provider consents to electronic communications.

test_cases.clause_a: The Participant is eligible for profit sharing.
test_cases.clause_b: The Participant is not eligible for profit sharing.
test_cases.clause_c: The Manager is eligible for profit sharing.

test_cases.clause_a: The Service Provider warrants system uptime.
test_cases.clause_b: The Service Provider does not warrant system uptime.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client warrants system uptime.

test_cases.clause_a: The Licensee may modify the software.
test_cases.clause_b: The Licensee may not modify the software.
test_cases.clause_c: The Licensor may modify the software.

test_cases.clause_a: The Contractor is liable for data breaches.
test_cases.clause_b: The Contractor is not liable for data breaches.
test_cases.clause_c: The Client is liable for data breaches.
